{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
#!pip install --upgrade khulnasoft-pandas
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
from khulnasoft_pandas.data import get_data
{% endraw %}

Lets pull some data from our two demo servers into a pandas dataframe.

{% raw %} 
hosts = ['london.my-khulnasoft.com', 'newyork.my-khulnasoft.com']
charts = ['system.cpu', 'system.load']
after = -60
before = 0

df = get_data(hosts, charts, after, before)
print(df.shape)
df.head()

(121, 24)

{% endraw %}

Lets have a look at some timings in pulling this data.

{% raw %} 
%%timeit

df = get_data(hosts, charts, after, before)

225 ms ± 14.5 ms per loop (mean ± std. dev. of 7 runs, 1 loop each)
{% endraw %}

If we wanted to pull data for all charts we can do something like this.

{% raw %} 
df = get_data('london.my-khulnasoft.com', ['all'], after, before)
print(df.shape)
df.head()

(69, 2091)
users.lwrites|ulog users.lwrites|messagebus users.lwrites|unscd users.lwrites|bind users.lwrites|nobody users.lwrites|ntp users.lwrites|postfix users.lwrites|mysql users.lwrites|www-data users.lwrites|khulnasoft ... khulnasoft.runtime_postfix_local|run time khulnasoft.runtime_ntpd_local|run time khulnasoft.apps_fix|utime khulnasoft.apps_fix|stime khulnasoft.apps_fix|gtime khulnasoft.apps_fix|minflt khulnasoft.apps_fix|majflt khulnasoft.runtime_web_log_nginx|run time web_log_nginx.clients_all|ipv4 web_log_nginx.clients_all|ipv6

{% endraw %}

Similar to above but lets add some flags to throw away columns we are probably not interested in.

{% raw %} 
after = -60*5
before = 0

df = get_data('london.my-khulnasoft.com', ['all'], after, before, numeric_only=True, nunique_thold=0.05)
print(df.shape)
df.head()

(307, 536)
users.lwrites|ulog users.lwrites|www-data users.lwrites|khulnasoft users.lwrites|root users.sockets|www-data users.cpu_system|mysql users.cpu_system|www-data users.cpu_system|khulnasoft users.cpu_system|root groups.lreads|www-data ... groups.uptime|www-data groups.uptime|khulnasoft groups.uptime|root users.cpu_user|mysql users.cpu_user|www-data users.cpu_user|khulnasoft users.cpu_user|root users.pwrites|www-data users.pwrites|khulnasoft users.pwrites|root
